text:
QUESTION 156) Shopping centers often exist parks with various toys and games. Users put credits on a card, which are discounted for each time of use of the games. Depending on the child's score in the game, she gets a number of tickets to exchange for products in parks stores.
Suppose the period of use of a toy in a certain mall costs $ 3.00 and that a bike costs 9 200 tickets.
For a child who receives 20 tickets for a period of time he plays, the amount, in reais, spent on credits to get the amount of tickets to exchange for the bike is
A) 153.
B) 460.
C) 1 218.
D) 1 380.
E) 3 066.
